title: CC Setting Off_Renewals
custom_preconds:
CC Settings for enabling renewal should be turned off 
Patron should have a renewal order(Reservations or receivables from PV)

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login to My Tickets Application 
2. Verify whether the Get Renewal API is called as a part of Login
3. Verify whether Renewals/Make Payments is displayed in left menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The Login should be successful
2. Get Renewal API should not be called as a part of Login process
3. Renewals/Make Payments should not be displayed in left menu

title: CC Setting On_Renewals
custom_preconds:
CC Settings for enabling renewal should be turned on
Patron should have a renewal order(Reservations or receivables from PV)

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login to My Tickets Application 
2. Verify whether the Get Renewal API is called as a part of Login
3. Verify whether Renewals/Make Payments is displayed in left menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The Login should be successful
2. Get Renewal API should be called as a part of Login process
3. Renewals/Make Payments should be displayed in left menu

title: My Renewals page - display for no available renewals
custom_preconds: A patron account which has no valid orders to renew (no reservations, pending schedule payments or pending manual payment)

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login to My tickets with the patron
2. Click on "Renew" from the left hand navigation menu
Verify that the Renewal Group API is called

3. Verify the same in mobile form as well
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login should be successful
2. The "My Renewals" renew group page should be displayed and the Get Renewal Group API should be called 
An error message "There are no renewable orders that require your attention at this time."
3. The mobile form should render the above info correctly

title: My Renewals page - Renewal group tile display for reservation with no associated renewal group
custom_preconds: A patron account which contains one reservation that is not associated to a renewal group

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login to My tickets with the patron
2. Click on "Renew" from the left hand navigation menu
Verify that the Renewal Group API is called
3. Verify the details of the renewal group tile
4. Verify the UI for renewal group from the API response
a. Renewal Tile
b. Renewal group public description if defined in Supplier Admin > Details > Online Renewals section
c. Renewal group public synopsis if defined in Supplier Admin > Details > Online Renewals section
d. Renew Button
e. Also verify primary theme colors 
f. Check for line feeds in public synopsis
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login should be successful
2. The "My Renewals" renew group page should be displayed and the Get Renewal Group API should be called 
3. When no renewal group is defined it gets the setting from Supplier Admin > Details > Online Renewals section
4. The UI should be displayed as expected and derived from Get Renewal group API response
Verify the UI for renewal group
a. Renewal Tile
b. Renewal group public description if defined
c. Renewal group public synopsis if defined
d. Renew Button
e. Primary theme colors 
f. Line Feeds should be properly displayed according to Renewal Group API response

title: Selecting a new delivery method
custom_preconds:
A reservation transaction should be completed for a package which is associated to renewal group and renew together is set as required
Also configure service charges for the package

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login to My tickets with the patron
2. Click on "Renew" from the left hand menu
Verify that the Renewal Group API is called
3. Verify the UI for renewal group
a. Renewal Tile
b. Renewal group image if defined
c. Renwal group public description if defined
d. Renewal group public synopsis if defined
e. Renew Button
f. Also verify primary theme colors 
g. Check for line feeds in public synopsis
4. Click on "Renew" button
Verify that the Get Renewal Orders API is called
5. Verify the UI of cart page
a. Renewal group public description 
b. Order id, Renew by date 
c. Package public description, package public synopsis
d. Buyer Type, Section, Row, Seat and Price
e. Delivery method
f. Payment schedule (Payment plan option) with view installment schedule and read more 
g. Order Total with service charges
h. Total Due Today
i.  Continue to checkout and cancel button
6. Click on Edit button of delivery method
Verify that all the delivery options are displayed 
7. Select a different delivery method (US MAIL)
Verify that the address is pre populated if the patron has the address
8. Click on Save
9. Click on Continue to Checkout
Verify that newly selected delivery method is sent in Renew cart lock API
10. Verify the UI and details in renewal checkout page
Verify that the newly selected delivery is displayed in UI

11. 1. Enter CVV and check the checkbox
2. Click on Checkout button
12. Verify the confirmation number is displayed
a. Manage Tickets button should be displayed
b. Order id, Renew by date 
c. Package public description, package public synopsis
d. Buyer Type, Section, Row, Seat and Price
e. Delivery method
f. Payment schedule (Payment plan option) with view installment schedule and read more 
g. Payment Method with credit card used
h. Transaction Summary with service charges
i. Subtotal 
j. Amount Paid Today
13. Verify the transaction details in PV
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Login should be successful
2. Get Renewal Group API should be called
The renew group page should be displayed
3. The UI should be displayed as expected
Verify the UI for renewal group
a. Renewal Tile
b. Renewal group image if defined
c. Renwal group public description if defined
d. Renewal group public synopsis if defined
e. Renew Button
f. Primary theme colors 
g. Check for line feeds in public synopsis
4. The cart page should be displayed
5. Verify the UI of cart page are correct
a. Renewal group public description 
b. Order id, Renew by date 
c. Package public description, package public synopsis
d. Buyer Type, Section, Row, Seat and Price
e. Delivery method
f. Payment schedule (Payment plan option) with view installment schedule and read more 
g. Order Total with service charges
h. Total Due Today
i.  Continue to checkout and cancel button
6. All the available delivery options should be displayed
7. The address should be pre populated
8. The changes should be applied and new delivery method should be persisted in UI
9. All the order details should be correct and the user should be navigated to renewal checkout page
10. 1. Verify all the details in the renewal checkout page 
2. Verify that all the total due amount and service charges are correct
3. Verify that the newly selected delivery is displayed in UI

11. The checkout should be successful and the confirmation page should be displayed
12. Confirmation number should be displayed and below details should be displayed
a. Manage Tickets button should be displayed
b. Order id, Renew by date 
c. Package public description, package public synopsis
d. Buyer Type, Section, Row, Seat and Price
e. Delivery method
f. Payment schedule (Payment plan option) with view installment schedule and read more 
g. Payment Method with credit card used
h. Transaction Summary with service charges
i. Subtotal 
j. Amount Paid Today
13. The transaction detail should be displayed in PV with transaction type as claim reservation with newly selected delivery method

title: Single reservation with Renewal group "Required and Credit is full auto/Pre-Apply
custom_steps:
go to "https://qastk1u.provenueapp.com:18443/springapp/login" Enter “USERNAME” into “Username”
Enter “PASSWORD” into “Password”
click "Login"
Mouse hover to "TICKETING SETUP"
click "SUPPLIER ADMINISTRATION"
insert "MLB" into search field
Click "FIND" 
click "Event Groups"
on the "Event Group Type:" dropdown select "Renwal Group"
Insert "Renewal group created by you" 
Click "FIND" 
Click on "Renewal group created by you"
on "Consume Credit During Online Renewal" drop down select "Pre-Apply"
on "Renew Together" dropdown select "Required"
Click "APPLY CHANGES"
Mouse hover to "TICKETING"
wait for 3 sec
click on "TICKET SALES"
click radiobutton "PACKAGE"
click on "FIND" button
click on the "YOUR PACKAGE"
click on the "Best"
click on "Selection Guide"
on the search button of "# of Tickets" Insert "1"
Click dropdwon menu of a "Buyer Type" and select "FSR"
click "LOCK SEATS"
ON "FINANCIAL PATRON" search box Insert"Patron ID"
Click "Find" and click "Set as patron"
Click "Reserve"
Click "Set to reservation"
Click "CHECKOUT"
check that page Contains"Your transaction has completed successfully."
custom_expected: User is able to complete a single reservation with Renew together required

title: Single Pending payments with Renewal group "Required and Credit is full auto/Pre-Apply
custom_steps:
go to "https://qastk1u.provenueapp.com:18443/springapp/login"

Enter “PASSWORD” into “Password”
Click “Login”
Mouse hover to "TICKETING SETUP"
click "SUPPLIER ADMINISTRATION"
insert "MLB" into search field
Click "FIND"
click "Event Groups"
on the "Event Group Type:" dropdown select "Renwal Group"
Insert "Renewal group created by you"
Click "FIND"
Click on "Renewal group created by you"
on "Consume Credit During Online Renewal" drop down select "Pre-Apply"
on "Renew Together" dropdown select "Required"
Click "APPLY CHANGES"
Verify that page contains "Renewal group created by you updated successfully."
Hover to "TICKETING SETUP"
click "SUPPLIER ADMINISTRATION"
insert "MLB" into search field
Click "FIND"
click "payment plans"
insert "your payment plan" on PAYMENT PLANS SEARCH box
Click "FIND"
click  on "your payment plan"
on "Use Scheduled Payments" dropdown select "Optional"
click  "APPLY CHANGES"
Verify that page contains "your payment plan updated successfully."
Mouse hover to "TICKETING"
wait for 3 sec
click on "TICKET SALES"
click radiobutton "PACKAGE"
click on "FIND" button
click on the "YOUR PACKAGE"
click on the "Best"
click on "Selection Guide"
on the search button of "# of Tickets" Insert "1"
Click dropdwon menu of a "Buyer Type" and select "FSR"
click "LOCK SEATS"
ON "FINANCIAL PATRON" search box Insert"Patron ID"
Click "Find" and click "Set as patron"
click "Reserve"
click "RECEIVABLES"
Click "Payment Plan"
on "Plan" dropdown select "Your payment plan"
Click "Build"
on "Receivable Type" dropdown select "OPNREC"
Click "DELIVERY"
on "Method" dropdown select "Digital Delivery"
Click "Apply"
Click "CHECKOUT"
Verify that Page contains "Your transaction has completed successfully."
